import React from "react"; import '../assets/css/eventform.css' class Eventregister extends React.Component{ state = { fname: "", lname: "", phnumber: "", city: "", age: "", kids: "" } handleChange = (event, fieldName) => { console.log(fieldName) this.setState({[fieldName]: event.target.value}) } handleSubmit = () => { const isValid = this.validate() console.log(this.state) } render() { return(
Hello Desktop
this.handleChange(event, "fname")} placeholder={"First Name"}/> this.handleChange(event, "lname")} placeholder={"Last Name"}/>
this.handleChange(event, "phnumber")} placeholder={"Phone Number"}/>
this.handleChange(event, "city")} placeholder={"City"}/> this.handleChange(event, "age")} placeholder={"Age"}/>
this.handleChange(event, "kids")} placeholder={"Kids"}/>
); } } export default Eventregister;
